quintessence.tip.create: Create may be *incredibly* overused, but it can be quite powerful if utilized properly.
quintessence.tip.mouse_tweaks: Remember that Mouse Tweaks is installed, so you can shift+click and drag the mouse to mass-move items (and more).
quintessence.tip.qol: As with all of my modpacks, there are a variety of Quality-of-Life recipes. Don't forget to use them.
quintessence.tip.wits: If you find a structure, you can type /wits in chat to see which structure it is - just be sure you're standing inside.
